mapper.sql: SELECT /* prTmplConrMappInfo.DisplayCornerList */ PTCMI.TMPL_NO , PTCMI.CONR_NO , CB.CONR_NM , PTCMI.DISP_YN , PTCMI.DISP_SEQ , TO_CHAR(PTCMI.DISP_STR_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(PTCMI.DISP_END_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_END_DTM , ( SELECT ARRAY_TO_STRING(ARRAY_AGG(FN_GET_CODENAME('DP005',S3.CONR_TGT_CD)),'+') FROM PR_CONR_TGT_INFO S3 WHERE PTCMI.CONR_NO = S3.CONR_NO ) AS DISP_TGT , PTCMI.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(PTCMI.SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_TMPL_CONR_MAPP_INFO PTCMI , PR_CONR_BASE CB WHERE PTCMI.CONR_NO = CB.CONR_NO AND PTCMI.TMPL_NO = #{tmplNo} ORDER BY PTCMI.DISP_SEQ

SELECT /* prTmplConrMappInfo.connerList */ PDCB.DISP_CTG_NO , PDCB.TMPL_NO , PDCB.SITE_NO , PTCMI.CONR_NO , PTCMI.DISP_YN , TO_CHAR(PTCMI.DISP_STR_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(PTCMI.DISP_END_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_END_DTM , PTCMI.DISP_SEQ , PCB.CONR_NM , PCB.USE_YN , ( SELECT ARRAY_TO_STRING(ARRAY_AGG(FN_GET_CODENAME('DP005',PCTI.CONR_TGT_CD)),'+') FROM PR_CONR_TGT_INFO PCTI WHERE PTCMI.CONR_NO = PCTI.CONR_NO ) AS CONR_TGT_CD FROM PR_DISP_CTG_BASE PDCB , PR_TMPL_CONR_MAPP_INFO PTCMI, PR_CONR_BASE PCB WHERE PDCB.DISP_CTG_NO = #{dispCtgNo} AND PDCB.TMPL_NO = PTCMI.TMPL_NO AND PTCMI.CONR_NO = PCB.CONR_NO ORDER BY PTCMI.DISP_SEQ
